name: MPMusicPlayerStoreQueueDescriptor
desc: A set of properties and methods used to modify items, based on their store identifier, in the playerâ€™s queue.

items.name: init(storeIDs: [String])
items.desc: Creates a new queue descriptor using the designated store identifiers.

items.name: var startItemID: String?
items.desc: The item identified by the store identifier that will be played first.

items.name: var storeIDs: [String]?
items.desc: An array containing the store identifiers found by the query used to create the queue descriptor.

items.name: func setStartTime(TimeInterval, forItemWithStoreID: String)
items.desc: Sets the time the designated store item is to start playing.

items.name: func setEndTime(TimeInterval, forItemWithStoreID: String)
items.desc: Sets the time the designated store item is to stop playing.
